# Shape of the Hellspawned Stalker (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC)Â­, pg. 117

*Rust-red fur sprouts from your skin, and your back hunches over until you stand on four clawed feet. Tendrils of black smoke curl from your fanged mouth.*

You take the form of a hell hound. You gain 10 temporary hit points, which disappear at the end of the spell's duration.
